title: Bug 3622 - New Package Wizard has confusing message
description: Bug 3622 - The New Package Wizard displays a confusing message when the package name field is empty.
OB: When the New Java Package Wizard is invoked and the package name field is empty, a message appears at the top stating 'A folder corresponding to the package name already exists'.
EB: When the New Java Package Wizard is invoked and the package name field is empty, there should be no message displayed.
SR:
1. Invoke the New Java Package Wizard.
2. Leave the package name field empty.
3. Verify that no message is displayed.
